name: iReflex
description:
Download on Google Play!

Ever wanted to find out how good your reflexes really are? Then iReflex is the game for you! The controls are simple; tap on the green button before the timer runs out, if the timer runs out or you tap the red button then its game over! Don't forget; the higher your multiplier the less time you have to react! Additionally you can spend coins gained through playing the on new buttons!

FEATURES

★ No advertisements! That's right... NONE!

★ Simple, hand crafted graphics

★ Gives you your slowest, quickest and average reflex times

★ Updated every month with heaps of new content!

★ Addictive game-play will keep you gripped!

★ No in-app purchases, hidden bills etc. Completely free!

Please consider supporting Pixal Games on Patreon
